check.name: TypeBodyPadding
check.description: Checks the padding policy for type bodies. Ensures that a blank line is present immediately after the opening brace and/or immediately before the closing brace of type definitions (class, interface, enum, record, and annotation types). Optionally, inner type definitions can be ignored via the skipInner property.

property.name: starting
property.description: require a blank line after the opening brace.

property.name: ending
property.description: require a blank line before the closing brace.

property.name: allowEmpty
property.description: skip enforcement for completely empty type bodies ({}).

property.name: skipInner
property.description: whether to skip checking of inner types
